headline: HPE Appoints Phil Mottram to Lead Global Sales
summary: HOUSTON, September 16, 2025--HPE (NYSE: HPE) today named Phil Mottram as Executive Vice President and Chief Sales Officer, effective November 1, 2025. In this role, Mottram will lead HPE’s global sales teams across the company’s Servers and Hybrid Cloud solutions, as well as its channel and partner ecosystem. Mottram joined the company in 2019 and has held executive management roles including leading HPE’s networking business for four years.

headline: HPE's Networking Business Improves: What's Driving the Growth?
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise's Juniper deal boosts networking revenues 54% and profits 43%, sharpening its edge against Cisco and Arista.
